description: Full kitchen renovation including demolition, electrical, plumbing, flooring, countertops, backsplash, cabinetry, painting, and cleanup

tasks.task: Obtain permits and schedule inspections
tasks.notes: May take 1-2 weeks for permit approval

tasks.task: Coordinate material delivery schedule
Shut off water, electrical circuits, gas if applicable
Install protective covering and barriers
Position dumpster and establish debris removal plan
Disconnect and remove all appliances
Remove upper cabinets and mounting hardware
Remove lower cabinets and island
Remove countertops and backsplash
Remove existing flooring to subfloor
Remove light fixtures and disconnect wiring
Load and remove all demolition debris

materials.notes: Saw blades, drill bits, safety gear

tasks.task: Install new electrical circuits and panel work
Install outlet boxes and switch boxes
Run wiring for under-cabinet lighting
Install new water supply lines
Install new drain lines and venting
Install gas line for range/cooktop
Schedule and pass rough-in inspections
Modify framing for new layout
Patch and repair existing drywall
Install new drywall sections
Tape and mud all drywall joints
Apply texture to match existing
Prime all new and patched drywall
Level and prep subfloor surface
Install underlayment if required
Plan layout and make initial cuts
Install flooring material
tasks.notes: Time varies significantly by flooring type

tasks.task: Install transition strips and thresholds
Clean and inspect flooring installation

materials.notes: Price varies widely by species and grade

tasks.task: Prepare electrical for finish work
Prepare plumbing for fixture installation
Receive and inspect cabinet delivery
Install upper cabinets and secure to studs
Install lower cabinets and island
Align and level all cabinet units
Install cabinet doors and drawer fronts
Install crown molding and trim
Install cabinet hardware and accessories

materials.notes: Price varies dramatically by quality and style

tasks.task: Create countertop template
Fabricate countertops off-site
Install fabricated countertops
Cut sink opening and install sink
Seal countertop joints and edges
Layout backsplash pattern and mark cuts
Prepare wall surface and apply primer
Install backsplash tiles
Cut tiles around outlets and edges
Apply grout and clean excess
Seal grout lines and clean tiles
Install pendant lights and under-cabinet lighting
Install outlets, switches, and cover plates
Install kitchen faucet and connect supply lines
Connect dishwasher, disposal, and other appliances
Test all electrical circuits and connections
Test all plumbing connections for leaks
Protect surfaces and prep for painting
Fill holes, sand, and prime walls
Paint ceiling (if included in scope)
Apply first coat of wall paint
Apply second coat of wall paint
Paint trim, doors, and cabinet touch-ups
Remove tape, clean brushes, final inspection

materials.notes: Coverage depends on surface texture and color change
Brushes, rollers, trays, tape, drop cloths

tasks.task: Coordinate and receive appliance deliveries
Install and connect all appliances
Final cabinet door and drawer adjustments
Install remaining hardware and accessories
Test all appliances and systems

materials.notes: Wide price range based on features and brand

tasks.task: Remove all debris and construction materials
Professional deep cleaning of entire kitchen
Final inspection and punch list creation
Complete punch list items and touch-ups
Demonstrate appliances and systems to client
Provide warranty documentation and care instructions

large.description: Large kitchen with island and pantry

common_complications.notes: May require permits and engineering approval

common_complications.issue: Electrical panel requires upgrade for new load
common_complications.notes: Common in homes over 20 years old

common_complications.issue: Existing plumbing not up to current code
common_complications.notes: Must be brought to code during renovation

common_complications.issue: Asbestos found in flooring or drywall
Permit approval delays or requirement changes
common_complications.notes: Can add 1-3 weeks to project timeline

common_complications.issue: Custom materials delayed or damaged in shipping
common_complications.notes: Countertops and custom cabinets most susceptible

common_complications.issue: HVAC ducts interfere with new layout
Subfloor not level, requires extensive prep

kitchen_square_footage.notes: Measure interior dimensions of kitchen space

backsplash_square_footage.notes: Measure from counter to upper cabinets

base_cabinet_linear_feet.notes: Measure along wall where base cabinets will be installed

upper_cabinet_linear_feet.notes: Usually 70-80% of base cabinet linear footage

permit_requirements.notes: City and county requirements differ significantly

labor_rates.notes: Urban areas typically 20-40% higher than rural

code_requirements.notes: Electrical and plumbing codes have local variations

critical_path: permits → demolition → rough_in → inspection → drywall → flooring → cabinets → countertops → backsplash → final_connections → cleanup
